english.segment1: We are the sons and daughters of a revolution. Revolutionaries walking us out of oppression and into a no-law promised land. Where there is no right or wrong
english.segment2: And this leaves us with a great sense of sadness growing inside our soul. No one can explain where it's coming from. Or where it's taking us
english.segment3: We just know that something is lost
english.segment5: And this, my friend, is the great depression
